FactDemaAggregator.mainSelect:
select a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 a.cpod, --1 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,a.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 c.operando, --4 decode (c.operando,'ED_LIM_BOP',B.VALORI,'EDPOTDIS00',cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)),'EDPOTCIMP0',cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10)),cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10))), -- 5 cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)), -- 6 b.valori, --7 b.prezzo, --8 c.id_operando --9 from z_anagrafica_operandi c,z_prodotto_operando b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele a,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d
where a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR in (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 42') and c.tipo='DEMA' and b.ctar1=a.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and b.acquisizione= a.cfreq and c.operando=b.operando and a.d_valido_dal=d.valid_from and a.d_valido_al=d.valid_until --and get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,a.d_valido_al,data_validita_al)> '20080401'

FactDemaExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_DEMA.TIPO,--5 FACTS_F_DEMA.OPERAND,--6 FACTS_F_DEMA.SAISON,--7 FACTS_F_DEMA.PROG,--8 FACTS_V_DEMA.LEGACY,--9 FACTS_V_DEMA.TIPO,--10 FACTS_V_DEMA.AB,--11 FACTS_V_DEMA.BIS,--12 FACTS_V_DEMA.LMENGE,--13 FACTS_V_DEMA.LMENGE2,--14 FACTS_V_DEMA.TARIFART,--15 FACTS_V_DEMA.KONDIGR,--16 FACTS_V_DEMA.PROG --17 FROM FACTS_KEY, FACTS_F_DEMA, FACTS_V_DEMA WHERE FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY AND FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY = FACTS_V_DEMA.LEGACY and FACTS_F_DEMA.PROG = FACTS_V_DEMA.PROG order by FACTS_F_DEMA.prog

UDEFAggregator.mainSelect: select a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 a.cpod, --1 b.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,a.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 c.id_operando , --5 substr(a.ctar1, 0,10) , --6 substr( a.ctar1, 11) ,(length (a.ctar1)), --7 b.acquisizione --9 from z_anagrafica_operandi c,z_prodotto_operando b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele a,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR in (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 42') and c.tipo='USERDEF' and b.ctar1=a.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and b.acquisizione= a.cfreq and c.operando=b.operando and a.d_valido_dal=d.valid_from and a.d_valido_al=d.valid_until -- AND get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,a.d_valido_dal,a.d_valido_al,data_validita_al) > '20080401'

UDEFExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_UDEF.TIPO, --5 FACTS_F_UDEF.OPERAND, --6 FACTS_F_UDEF.SAISON,--7 FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG, --8 FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY, --9 FACTS_V_UDEF.TIPO,--10 FACTS_V_UDEF.AB, --11 FACTS_V_UDEF.BIS, --12 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL1, --13 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL2,--14 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL3,--15 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL4,--16 FACTS_V_UDEF.TARIFART, --17 FACTS_V_UDEF.KONDGIR, --18 FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG --19 FROM FACTS_KEY,FACTS_F_UDEF,FACTS_V_UDEF WHERE FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY AND FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY = FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY and FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG = FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG order by FACTS_F_UDEF.prog
